post.body: Twitter Tools is working just great for me on my site, http://nullsession.net - THANKS!
Your avatar is funny. It's like if the Grinch were Canadian. ;-)
Well, I chose a lesser used site to try it first. I like the idea of automated upgrades.
I have CS2 and I want to upgrade this year. At least I'm not paying full price.
If people knew a little more science, they'd realize descending from "primordial soup" is an amazing & beautiful thing.
I just watched that on DirecTV Saturday night. LOL. Better than the first, I liked it.
LOL. Is there ANYTHING that isn't better with bacon?
I was waiting for the opportunity to proclaim that it was meaningless, but alas no, I swore at or on no bibles today.
Boy, almost sounds like you've mentally moved to Colorado. How will you be able to return to Cville?
According to weather.com, it's colder here than at the North Pole! Good 4u Santa.
Proctoring my final astronomy exam.
Gag, my dog just farted. I'm outta here...
Started watching box-set of Space: Above and Beyond. But now, time for bed. It will be very cold and icy when driving to the office at 6am.
Still in a blue funk. Frantic rain falling outside. Just not in the holiday spirit. Heading out to pick up pizza. Comfort food.
A very ominous darkness from the west seems to be casting a pall across the sky.
Watching Stargate Atlantis...
New blog post: w00t! http://www.nullsession.net/?p=2566
Can tomorrow really be Friday? This week has whizzed by! Nite!
Does anyone have a good Twitter widget for WordPress, that works? I have the basic "Twitter for WordPress" and after WP2.7 is won't update.
Strange, I had two updates yesterday, and my WordPress widget isn't updating. I bet it's 'cause I upgraded to WP2.7. Time to update patches.
I got my new Razer "Black Adder" mouse & "Destructor" gaming pad. Very cool! The mouse pulsates. May be the best available for Mac. :)
Just upgraded all my WordPress blogs to 2.7. Noyce!
Nothing much going on, might as well try WordPress 2.7 RC2, right? What's the worst that can happen?
Going to the store. Need groceries and maybe more. Better go before the snow plow hits my truck.
I'm sending back my flaky AT&T Tilt and setting up my warranty replacement, w/new battery. Yay!
Damn, Skins was such a good program. Thanks @skinsbbcamerica!
Please DM if you can direct me to 2008 Doctor Who Christmas Special or pst comment http://is.gd/d4av. BBC won't broadcast in US on Xmas :-(
God I hate the "Rhino Furtada" "Emo Pinata" commercial from Verizon. With a passion. Can't hit the mute button fast enough.
is watching Prison Break and transferring 113Gb in movies and music to the new iMac, using his 80Gb iPod. Estimate = 2 hours
Well, the dark night has come. It is 5pm after all. I think it's also heading back for subzero temps. Am I a Grinch to ask for 50F on Xmas?
A very cold morning here. I rushed to jury duty (no breakfast) then sat for 3 hrs before the judge dismissed us. Pled guilty when he saw us.
Having fun at jury duty. Sentenced three people to death, and the day's still young!
Has anyone tried medicine that expired like a year and a half ago? What can go wrong with Claratin that expired 3/2007? I'm sure it's fine.
Thanks to everyone who wished Ellie well. (Sick dog.) I think the doggy antibiotics are helping, at least it's only a sore toe!
I typed up a post complaining about the cold, then I looked at my weather widget, and the "real feel" is -27F. Jesus Christ that's frigid!
I pulled my back, probably carrying the dog up and down the stairs. Ow. Jury duty will be fun in the AM!
http://twitpic.com/v453 - My poor dog can't lick herself. She's sad. I've put a big plastic collar on her until her paw heals up.
Anyone else ever have this happen? New iMac, playing WoW and the power cuts off. Nice. Right after picking a fight.
Happy Yule, Solstice lovers!
Watching the snow come down and setting up my iMac. Ho! Ho! Ho!
